texts.Description:Ent.Identity.Password.Requir: The minimum length a password must be.
The minimum number of unique characters which a password must contain.
If passwords must contain a non-alphanumeric character.
If passwords must contain a lower case ASCII character.
If passwords must contain a upper case ASCII character.
If passwords must contain a digit.

texts.Description:Ent.Identity.Password.Passwo: The number of days a user's password is valid for.
texts.Description:Ent.Identity.Lockout.Allowed: Whether a new user can be locked out.

texts.Description:Ent.Identity.Lockout.MaxFail: The number of failed access attempts allowed before a user is locked out, assuming lock out is enabled.

texts.Description:Ent.Identity.User.IsEmailUpd: Whether the email can be updated by the user.
